TextFlow.header: Remember to use the correct layout for the letter
TextFlow.p: Write your address, but not your name, in the top right-hand corner.
Write the name and address of the person you are writing to on the left-hand side.
If you do not know the name of the person, use a title, such as 'Customer Services Manager'.
It is helpful to give a reference number or some kind of heading at the beginning of your letter, for example, English Course July 1st – 22nd, or Student number 12345.
